ygData.subject: Location of Runes
ygData.msgSnippet: Where is location of the following runes/ which monsters carry them and what zone are they in? - Rathe - Crippling - Impetus - Astral - Frost - Astral -
ygData.messageBody:

zone are they in?

- Impetus

and put it on a web page for all to view.
Thanks
